originalText.text: The worst trying to book a Santa and the women Eve was so rude then she sends me an email that was downright stupid, stay clear

text.text: The worst trying to book a Santa and the women Eve was so rude then she sends me an email that was downright stupid, stay clear

originalText.text: I have really enjoyed working with Kevin and Clown Magic over the last 6 years.  He sent a Mime and Gypsy/ Fortune Teller for my sister's Bridal Shower in 2012, and they were a perfect match for our Mardi Gras theme. In 2016 I told him my one year old daughter was afraid of clowns but that I wanted entertainment for little kids and he sent a friendly, mellow, singing, guitar playing sweet clown that read the children (of varying ages) super well.  SHe remembered everyone's name and engaged each kid in an activity.  In 2017 he sent a Batman Magician to my daughter's superhero 2nd birthday and finally SANTA to my Ugly Christmas Sweater Party (real beard, jolly, gave out gifts provided by us and read my daughter's books to all her cousins and friends).  SHe still keeps asking me when he is coming back!!  I am calling Kevin today to book a STiltWalker for my Goddaughter's Sweet 16.  After doing some research, CLown Magic is still the best option for the STilt Walker!  I trust that like before, my party will be infinitely enhanced and my guests smiling widely because of the presence of Clown Magic Entertainment.

originalText.text: I have used this company for my nephews bday party at my house and had a great time. Also used for my daughters 1st bday for a Minnie and 3rd bday for paw patrol. I wasn’t sure what Chase would be doing for an hour but he kept the kids entertained and joined in the fun with them. Good prices and good service!

originalText.text: Great company. Kevin who is the office manager was so helpful. I hired a magician for my nieces communion the kids had a great time

originalText.text: lazy, rude, unprofessional; had my daughters bday party with 12 kids a friend came along with 2 more and this CLOWN went berzerk that too many kids were coming in..really an paying aren't I.!? Find another company..
